WorkItem.ClosedComment: The fix should be visible in the upcoming release. Thanks!
WorkItem.Description:
At typescriptlang.org/playground, type in code like this:

```TypeScript
export var x = 42;
```

No error is reported, but the right hand pane does not show anything (or, depending on how fast you typed, shows "exp" or "export" or similar).

There are two related issues here:
1) The playground is not reporting codegen errors anywhere
2) The playground seems to not be turning on external module support.  Should it set AMD mode by default so that you can see the codegen for this style of development?
WorkItem.Summary: TypeScript playground silently fails when using external modules
